summary: Every \"Bug in a Jar\" from Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This bat file contains all the hard to find \"bug jars\" in Skyrim, there are five total. They make great decorations for your home!

Install:
Copy the file named, \"Everybug\" to your Skyrim/Data folder

In-game, open the console and type \"bat everybug\" (no quotes)

[color=\"#FF0000\"]Warning:[/color] 

-Save before using. (Better safe then sorry!)

~Fiddlestyx~

P.s. I like comments and/or suggestions :D

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out the other \"Every\" mods!

EveryBook  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3175

EveryClothes  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3368
author: Fiddlestyx
